participant_1.background:

i like to write poetry.
i can read in english and french.

participant_2.background:
I threw a huge party to celebrate my new freedom.
I haven't worked at my current job for very long, because I just moved to Vienna.
I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself.
I am close to my mother and love to spend time with her.
i m bored with my current lifestyle.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Hey! It's going great! I just moved to Vienna and I'm really excited about it!
Oh wow, that's awesome! I've always wanted to visit Vienna. What do you like most about it?
I love the architecture and the food. And the people are so friendly!
That's great to hear! I'm sure you'll have a great time there.
Thanks! I'm sure I will. What are you up to today?
I'm just working on my business. I'm a welder and I'm trying to get more customers.
Oh wow, that's cool! I've always been impressed by welders.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun, but it can be really hard work.
I bet! But it's worth it when you see the finished product.
Exactly! It's so satisfying to see something you've created come to life.
That's what I love about my job. I get to see the results of my work every day.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy your job so much.
Thanks! I'm really lucky to have found something I love doing.
